file_content.text: Funny... I'd almost forgotten what pain felt like.
Surely I'm trophy enough for you today. The wounded here are barely clinging to life. Just go... leave them in peace.
They chose their fate the second they joined Corellia's resistance.
No. [Smash the life support]
Code red. All patient life signs critical.
You monster....
Seventy-three percent of patients deceased. Eighty-six percent... all patients deceased.
I came here to win Axial Park, not torment the infirm.
Your wounded don't concern me.
At least there's that. The medical droids will evacuate the patients... I can't protect them anymore....
So you're responsible for the Empire's sudden victories. I'm surprised you'd have the courage to face me.
You know I can't be killed? Blasters, grenades, even lightsabers--no effect. I've defended the Republic for decades without a scratch.
Some even call me "The Sith Butcher." Not to my taste, but accurate enough.
Imperials tremble at my name. Moffs have rerouted capital ships to avoid me.
Mandalorians call me "Verda JÃ©dii" and even they cower at the name.
A true Mandalorian would kill you blindfolded. Unarmed.
You insult my order.
I forget how many mercenaries have tried collecting my bounty. All failed.
I've faced every manner of Sith, Imps, galactic scum. Survived all of 'em.
We'll see how your stories hold up when my lightsaber's at your throat.
I'm not easily tricked, Jedi.
Words won't mask your fear. I can smell it, wafting out of every pore.
I'm not easily tricked, Jedi.
Your performance is wasted, Jedi.
Intimidation is useless on me.
The more inflated your reputation, the more credits I get for your head.
Keep spouting your lies.
You paint an impressive picture, Jedi. I hope you can live up to it.
Good. I like a challenge.
Overconfident. Like Darth Malak who the men and women here died to defeat.
Well, I might as well surrender and join the Republic.
You're a big, silly man.
Corellia's fate is not a joking matter.
This garden honors champions of the Jedi Civil War. Heroes. Revan, Bastila Shan and my ancestors--Zabrak who fought to save the galaxy.
I follow in their great tradition. When I strike you down, the Empire loses its only hope of taking Corellia.
Draw your lightsaber. Show me how powerful you really are.
Then prove yourself.
Draw your lightsaber. I don't need the Force to kill an "immortal" Jedi.
Just try to strike me down.
You just don't shut up.
I knew you wouldn't listen. They never do.
Bloodshed it is. [Attack]
Corellia!
